name: S.N.3.K.4
description:
Controls: WASD / Arrow Keys

S.N.3.K.4 is not a classic snake game you're all thinking about, it's a cyberpunk chaos.
Reach the Glowing Neon Point and then reach another one, and then the next one...

After reaching each GNP you'll spawn an Imposter. He'll try to mimic your previous moves so each wrong move can lead to a defeat.

This is small project made in <8h after Game Jam I was planning to go was canceled bacause of the infamous Coronavirus. Only LeanTween asset wasn't made by me during this period. I tried to use for the first time the new Input System and VFX (which don't work on WebGL *SadPanda*).
